CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 12, 1959, pg. SM4_5 reads: "The Green Thumb Club - One of the unusually active clubs at Kay Boys Club is the Green Thumb, composed of boys from 10 to 13 years. The boys provide and care for plants in building.  Miss Ruth Hoffman is the club's supervisor.  Left to right: Alfred White, Grover Taylor, Miss Hoffman, volunteer worker; Thomas Thrift and Melvin Green. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Ruth Hoffman and members of the Green Thumb Club, from left: Alfred White, Grover Taylor, Thomas Thrift, and Melvin Green, posed with potted plants in Kay Boy's Club, another version
